title: Mohist在客户端登入时发生错误崩溃
author: Dawn_Ocean
txt_content:
服务端开服正常,加载过程中出现[09:53:25 ERROR]: The mod tickdynamic is expecting signature fc6c96880539df54ba847abda8844dabfcef307e for source [优化]TickDynamic-1.12.2-1.0.2.jar, however there is no signature matching that description
和[09:53:31 ERROR]: Error discovering plugin for class snownee.jade.JadeClientPlugin: snownee.jade.JadeClientPlugin

在玩家登入进去后,登入中服务器崩溃




TIM图片20200221095609.png (17.74 KB, 下载次数: 0)

2020-2-21 09:56 上传

replies.author: Mohist-Communit
replies.txt_content: 把FastWorkBench的配置文件中 移除配方书的改为false即可，暂时对这个mod兼容不太稳定

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content:
把服务端内的客户端模组删掉试试
journeymap 
inventorytweaks
jei  
dsurround
titlechanger

replies.author: Dawn_Ocean
replies.txt_content:
不行,删除后仍然出现错误

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content: 线程卡住了  建议优化一下服务端， 或者 删除这个优化插件

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
尝试更新或删除FastWorkBench
（玩家一进不去二出不来也是绝了）
